name: INRidePartySizeOption
desc: The price of a ride involving the specified number of people.

items.name: init(partySizeRange: NSRange, sizeDescription: String, priceRange: INPriceRange?)
items.desc: Initializes the object with the specified party size and price ranges.

items.name: var partySizeRange: NSRange
items.desc: The number of people in the party, specified as a minimum and maximum value.

items.name: var sizeDescription: String
items.desc: The user-visible description of the party size.

items.name: var priceRange: INPriceRange?
items.desc: The pricing information for parties of the specified size.
